snippet: Liverpool stands in the way of a third straight Europa League title for Sevilla after the clubs, which both have rich pedigrees in Europe’s second-tier competition, reached the final.
abstract: Sevilla defeats Shakhtar Donetsk, 3-1, to advance to Europa League final, 5-3, on aggregate.
lead_paragraph: Liverpool stands in the way of a third straight Europa League title for Sevilla after the clubs, which both have rich pedigrees in Europe’s second-tier competition, reached the final.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Liverpool to Face Sevilla
